author: Saagar Kotecha
text:
The watch I received is defective. The hour and minute hands don’t align. Could not find any way to return the product either. 

Surprised that the product was sent to StockX for checking and still certified as sellable.
title: The watch I received is defective

author: Dulce
text:
I was told I could not receive my item for reasons I do not understand. I was told I would receive a refund…I have not received an answer to my inquiry, nor have I received a refund. The shoes I ordered were supposed to
be a present for my son’s 13th birthday. If someone sees this, please explain the reason why i can not receive my order and also please refund. I am about to bring a complaint to the Better Business Bureau.

author: Hustle
text:
I didn’t know that the purchase was actually a 3 week process just to find out half way through the purchase my shoes were fake. 

Once I found out I gave up on StockX and just bought my shoes direct from Nike.com which arrived in 3days

text: Never received my order and no one will respond to my emails.

author: Natalie
text: I ordered a size 9 in women's and received a size 9 in men’s. They were quick to help me get a refund (after they receive the shoes) & discount, however, the prices fluctuate daily so I would have much rather received an exchange or at least a deal where they sold me the same shoes the price I paid since I went through this whole process and ended up with the wrong shoes. This was my first purchase here and I will not be a returning customer.
title: First purchase, received wrong size
